node.excerpt:
Liberation Through Art is the first work from the Dispersions I series, a series of paintings exploring Uniform 
Lidimism. In this piece I explored the divergent perspective as the main element to show the world of shadows where this
collection lives. The canvas is central, exploding to create theâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Liberation Through Art
frontmatter.description: This piece shows the first canvas of the Dispersions I series.
